instructors.label: Author
instructors.name: Rachel Gogos
instructors.description: Serial entrepreneur and personal brand maven, Rachel Gogos has been working with entrepreneurs, authors, thought-leaders and professional athletes to uncover their essence and get it on the web for over a decade.
